suite.name: Shabu Usecases

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.arg: \nเริ่มรันทดสอบชุด: Shabu Buffet Management ()\n
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

test.name: UC01 | สร้างลูกค้าใหม่ (Customer Create)

kw.name: Create
Log

kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.msg: ${_last_create_entity} = ลูกค้า
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.msg: ${_last_create_details} = {'id': 2, 'name': 'สมหญิง ใจดี', 'phone': '0898765432', 'email': 'somyhing@example.com'}
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.arg: {'id': 2, 'name': 'สมหญิง ใจดี', 'phone': '0898765432', 'email': 'somyhing@example.com'}

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Calculate
Log
kw.msg: คำนวณ โปรโมชัน ด้วย 500 * 0.9
kw.arg: คำนวณ ${what} ด้วย ${params}
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.msg: ${result} = 450.0
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.msg: ${after_discount} = 450.0

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.
